events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request for money back due to wrong product.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle the refund request related to the incorrect product delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you get this sorted quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the product you received and your order number so we can verify the details?
I have attached the photos of the incorrect product along with the receipt and my order number is 123456.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for being so quick to respond and offering a refund. I appreciate the support.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the case is now resolved on our end. Please contact us if you need anything else.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and are satisfied with how we handled the issue.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thanks again for your great support!
We are closing this case now as the refund was completed successfully and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
